wallet.title: Wallet Management
wallet.description: Manage your account balance and withdraw funds
wallet.withdrawalInstructions: Enter the amount to withdraw and payment details for your selected method.
wallet.paypalProcessing: PayPal withdrawals typically process within 1-2 business days. A 2.9% processing fee applies.
wallet.stripeProcessing: Stripe transfers usually complete within 2-7 business days depending on your bank. A 2.9% processing fee applies.
wallet.bankProcessing: Bank transfers can take 3-5 business days to complete. A $5 flat fee applies.
wallet.cryptoProcessing: Cryptocurrency withdrawals typically process within 1-6 hours. A 0.5% fee applies.
